title: Looking for an Icon image

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
I am looking for the raw image file for the new "Enemy has vision here" ping but with the new client it is seemingly not present.

I am just looking for the nice little eyeball and arrow for my new custom keycap set for my mechanical keyboard to show my love and dedication to this ping as a support player.

If necessary i will use my amazing MS paint talents to use my own image, as pictured.

replies.body:
> [{quoted}](name=Hornypotsmoker,realm=NA,application-id=osqw6G4M,discussion-id=M8xFpzEo,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-08-13T03:02:43.560+0000)
>
> I am looking for the raw image file for the new &quot;Enemy has vision here&quot; ping but with the new client it is seemingly not present.
> 
> I am just looking for the nice little eyeball and arrow for my new custom keycap set for my mechanical keyboard to show my love and dedication to this ping as a support player.
> 
> If necessary i will use my amazing MS paint talents to use my own image, as pictured.

I suck at drawing but I could try to make it, if i fail i will just tell you

Hmmmmm I don't have an actual raw image file for that ping at the moment, but maybe this will do for now?

https://i.gyazo.com/aaecf84b3ca6dd90699ba319e0599557.png
